trainingRecap: Attacking â€“ Make well-timed diagonal or vertical runs in behind to challenge depth and disrupt shape.
Play Through, Around or Over; Break lines by choosing the most effective route based on space, numbers, and pressure

gameModel.attackingOrganization: Break lines through, around, or over. Move beyond, below, and beside the ball to create options. Be composed, fast, and sharp.
gameModel.defensiveOrganization: Press high when we can. In our half, stay compact. In the box: fill space, find your mark, and clear big. Everyone defends.
gameModel.defensiveTransition: React fast, recover hard, regroup quickly. Win it back or slow them down.
gameModel.attackingTransition: Secure the ball first. If the break is on, go fast. If not, keep it and build with control.

gameModel.attackingOrganization: Break lines quickly and switch the point of attack to open space.
gameModel.defensiveOrganization: Stay compact, press in packs, and defend with numbers behind the ball.
gameModel.defensiveTransition: Recover quickly into shape, delay attackers.
gameModel.attackingTransition: Exploit wide areas on turnovers, otherwise retain possession.
